meanings: be involved in, get tangled up (with), be intertwined[entangled] with

vlive.korean: 난 왜 이렇게 준이 형이랑 많이 엮이지? Why do I always get put together with JUN? 듣기 View video OSEN : SEVENTEEN 세븐틴 'Star Road' EP.18
vlive.english: Why do I always get put together with JUN?

vlive.korean: 어떻게 멜로로 엮이는 건가요? 어떤 거죠? Is there any romance between your characters? 듣기 View video V DRAMA : 하늘에서 내리는 일억개의 별 X 앞터V (The smile has left your eyes X Early Interview)
vlive.english: Is there any romance between your characters?

vlive.korean: 내버려 둬 저런 애들은 또라이라서 최대한 안 엮이는 게 좋아. Just leave her... Guys like him are punks so it's best not to deal with them. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 바람피우고 잠수탄 전남친이 찾아왔다 [한입만] - EP.06
vlive.english: Just leave her... Guys like him are punks so it's best not to deal with them.

vlive.korean: [혜미랑 지독하게 엮이고 싶다 정말...] - 혹시 머리에 가사집 있니? - 대박. - 대박이다 진짜. Do you have lyric book on your head? - Amazing. - She's really amazing. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [9MUSES] 햄필승❗️인간 가사집 표혜미🎤🎶 (9MUSES's singing challenge)
vlive.english: Do you have lyric book on your head? - Amazing. - She's really amazing.

vlive.korean: 솔직히 엮이고 싶지 않아요. But I don't want to be involved. 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처 ep101_방송 촬영 중 화장실! 가도 된다? 안 된다?
vlive.english: But I don't want to be involved.

examples.korean: Her hair was interlaced with ribbons and flowers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 머리에는 리본과 꽃이 엮여 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her hair was interlaced with ribbons and flowers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Dying is a very dull, dreary affair. And my advice to you is to have nothing whatever to do with it. (W. Somerset Maugham) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 죽는다는 건 정말 지루하고 따분한 일이다. 그러니 당신에게 해 줄 수 있는 말은 죽음과는 절대 엮이지 말라는 것이다. (서머셋 모옴, 죽음명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Dying is a very dull, dreary affair. And my advice to you is to have nothing whatever to do with it. (W. Somerset Maugham) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I don't want to be involved in that anymore. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 더 이상 그 일에 엮이고 싶지 않다 Neungyule
examples.english: I don't want to be involved in that anymore. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Their relationship has become complicatedly entangled. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 관계는 묘하게 엮였다 Neungyule
examples.english: Their relationship has become complicatedly entangled. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: To live in a society, people need to engage and form relationships with each other. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사회에서 살아가려면 사람들은 엮여야 하고 서로 관계를 형성 해야 한다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: To live in a society, people need to engage and form relationships with each other. Add to Wordbook
